messageBody:
> Just a thought,
>
> Have you considered using a TestSuite to solve your problem?
> That way you could use any number of ClassLoader setups in a
> single test run and your tests would run the same way in maven and eclipse
> (I guess JUnit.jar needs to be loaded via a common classloader for failures
> and errors to be reported properly. Classloaders usually precent some
> unforseen issues).

Thanks ...actually that's what I came up, too. I've had a nasty complication
because I needed abstract testcases (too much details for this thread
- whatever) ....but in the end if worked fine.

If someone is interested - this was for commons-javaflow. We needed testing
for the same testcases through two different classloaders.

cheers
--
